# cookieAcceptPolicy

**Instance Property**

The cookie storage’s cookie accept policy.

## Declaration

```swift
var cookieAcceptPolicy: HTTPCookie.AcceptPolicy { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default cookie accept policy is [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/HTTPCookie/AcceptPolicy/always]. Changing the cookie policy affects all currently running applications using the cookie storage.

## Getting and setting the cookie accept policy

- **HTTPCookie.AcceptPolicy**: Cookie acceptance policies implemented by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/HTTPCookieStorage] class.
